name: WHO ARE YOU
description:
WHAT

A simple game about a seemingly simple concept... the difference between right and wrong.

WHY

This game was made for One Hour Game Jam 232. The theme was MORALITY.

HOW

Instructions are simple... click on the orange bits to progress the story... until you have to make the choice between good and bad... then, you can press whichever color you want, depending on the choice you WANT to make.

~
